content: HARDWARE WALLETS REVIEWSThe purpose of this thread is to provide a review thread not directly by me,but Users of one or more  Hardware Wallets . This could provide a simple and easy way review  for someone trying to get a particular hardware wallet , he or she can easily go through the reviews of choice hardware wallet List Of Hardware walletsLedger Nano X Trezor Model T Ledger Nano S Plus SafePal S1 Ledger Stax D’CENT CoolWallet Pro BitBox02 Ellipal Titan SecuX V20 Keystone Pro Trezor Model One KeepKey Opolo BitkeyColdcard Mk4 Satochip  Among others.....Ntc: if there's any hardware probably omitted from the list  it can be notified so it can also be added to the listAny user familiar or uses one or more of these wallets / any other  hardware wallet can drop their reviews Based on: Present or previous experience Review on Usage Speed, Durability,  Hardware component Functionality  and designLimitations,  Setbacks Other features Nte: Based on reviews hardware list can be modified
